itemDescription: Welsh model, television personality and actress

wikipedia_page.main: Danielle Maria Bux (born 15 June 1979) is a Welsh actress and model. She made her modelling début in 1999 winning a place on the Miss Hawaiian Tropic beauty pageant in Las Vegas. She was married to former England footballer Gary Lineker from 2009 until 2016.

response: *Danielle Lineker (born 1979), Welsh model, Ex-wife of Gary Lineker
*Danielle Lineker (née Bux), a Welsh model (and Gary Lineker's wife).
